jsPDF Library Placeholder

This is a placeholder file. For the extension to work with PDF exports, you need to include the jsPDF library.

How to Add jsPDF:

  1. Download jsPDF from: https://github.com/parallax/jsPDF
  2. Or use CDN version: https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/jspdf/2.5.1/jspdf.umd.min.js
  3. Place the jspdf.umd.min.js file in this directory (lib/vendor/)
  4. Reference it in your HTML files

Alternative: Use CDN in popup.html

Add this script tag to popup.html before exporter.js:

<script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/jspdf/2.5.1/jspdf.umd.min.js"></script>

For Development:

Update popup.html to include:

<script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/jspdf/2.5.1/jspdf.umd.min.js"></script>
<script src="../lib/exporter.js"></script>
